original_text: So I think that widows who are still young women should marry again. Then they can have children and they can take care of their own homes. If they live well like that, the enemy of God's people will not have a chance to say bad things against us.
korean_text: 그러므로 젊은이는 시집 가서 아이를 낳고 집을 다스리고 대적에게 비방할 기회를 조금도 주지 말기를 원하노라

sentences.original_text: that widows who are still young women

sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그들은 아이를 낳을 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: and they can take care of their own homes
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자기 집을 돌볼 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: If they live well like that
will not have a chance to say bad things against us
sentences.korean_translation: 우리를 비난할 기회를 갖지 못할 것입니다
